Mas mesmo com tudo isso, o gordon ainda n fala, que eu acho que bom de qualquer jeito, MUITOS protagonistas bad-ass n falam, e ele deve ter uma raz√£o do pq ele n fala, n √© q nem o cloud do gta 3, que ele n falava pq os caras n sabiam como colocar fala de personagens em um jogo t√£o grande como aquele dentro de um ps2. Com certeza maravilhosa a hist√≥ria, que deixa com mais duvidas do q respostas, pq o final do primeiro ti deixa maluco, oq q vai acontecer, o gordon foi para o lado do G-MAN?????, e isso n √© respondido nem nada, por isso que √© lindo. E as jogatinas divertidas s√£o iguais do primeiro, que eu n reclamaria de jeito nenhum, pq esse tipo de gameplay √© fant√°stico, atirar nos outros √© maravilhosamente legal, e as vezes vc esquece do pq vc t√° atirando, mas mesmo assim insanamente bom, com MUITAS armas diferentes pra vc usar, junto com a grande gravity gun, que √© culpa da havok. Nice game but different from 1st hl, has different weapon and enemies.
the airboat and the jeep give a special touch on this game (can't use everywhere but only in same area)

this game for its own age is good, I think valve will never let release hl3 due the hype and passed too long time for the last hl. Valve have bad policy on this (my personal idea, valve no offense) but after long time you release alyx in VR version and no possibility to the customer to access at least without a VR.

Here you don't have a training part that's bad, but you meet the main player of blue shift that help Gordon F. to escape from train.

Gman -->this guy smell badness but G. F. must to work for him without a real choice (also in hl1 no real choice or die or work for him and the first choice is not canon), in opposing force no choice and your character will be blocked for eternity there and blue shift he doesn't show up.

they have introduced a new creature that help G. F. but without explain the story how we meet them and why the world has changed especially city 17 (into a nazi/fascist regime) they why the antagonist has become bad and reached the power.....all point ignored, just the gman told "hey stupid wake up, another job for you" so from the 1st hl has been blocked in that train ...

gman you see in hl 1 that is walking in some places maybe he could help in some situation but he doesn't give a s.-it, so why gman is kind of mean --->the conclusion that he use G.F. for personal gain, but where he game from? that's the big question.

Gameplay -->good
story -->OK, but could be have done a better explanations on the other NPGs
graphic*--> still very impressive.
NPG -->sometime stupids
IA --> I've seen worst (OK)


Overall nice game to have fun --> Valve hl3 you have the time to let this game good.

Okay even though I've watched so many Half-Life videos and I basically knew the whole plot before I even got the game, it is still an amazing game to play. And though it's main aspect is fighting combine, it doesn't only focus on fighting and develops the plot around you instead of shoving it in your face with cut scenes. With interactable characters and settings that tell stories it really makes you immersed. I love Half-Life.

If the original Half-Life is what put Valve on the map, then Half-Life 2 is what cemented their legacy as one of the greatest game developers of all time. Although their previous games on the GoldSrc engine were more or less limited by the technology of the time, Half-Life 2 smashes those barriers and delivers an adventure that is still almost as immersive and groundbreaking as the day it was released. I swear to you that there are moments in this game that look like they're taken straight from a photograph. A true 10/10 masterpiece.

I played this game for the first time in 2022 btw.
